source.info: Airbus Elevation 0.5m, is a highly precise digital elevation model derived from Pléiades-Neo 30cm stereo and tri-stereo optical satellite imagery.

frontEndRules.name: min_aoi_geometry
frontEndRules.description: cannot task under this physical geometry limit

frontEndRules.label: min_date_length
frontEndRules.details: cannot set tasking length or interval length to less than value

frontEndRules.label: max_date_length
frontEndRules.details: cannot set tasking length or interval length to greater than value

options.details: Output is a digital surface model. Man-made objects and vegetation are included in this model.
Output is a digital terrain model. This is a bare earth model where man-made objects and vegetation are removed
Output includes both the digital terrain model and digital surface model.
Output includes a digital terrain model, digital surface model and ortho-mosaic generated from the collected Pléiades-Neo imagery.

offerings._comment: the offering has to be calculated using our offerings end point.

configurations._comment: show configuration for selected offering (will return from offering call). properties should be displayed as a key:value pair  with key bolded. parameters should return as dicated in the configuration parameters dictionary
